content.query:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeSurvey
(
	 [EmployeeNumber] INT,
	 [Age] INT,
	 [JobLevel] INT,
	 [Department] VARCHAR,
	 [Education] VARCHAR,
	 [Gender] VARCHAR, 
	 [JobRole] VARCHAR,
	 [MaritalStatus] VARCHAR,
	 [NumCompaniesWorked] INT,
	 [PerformanceRating] INT,
	 [TrainingTimeLastYear] INT,
	 [YearsAtCompany] INT,
	 [YearsInCurrentRole] INT,
	 [YearSinceLastPromotion] INT,
	 [YearsWithCurr4] INT,
	 [JobSatisfaction] INT,
	 [EnvironmentSatisfaction] INT,
	 [WorkLifeBalance] INT,
	 [EmployeeCount] INT,
	 [HourlyRate] DECIMAL
)
